title: Does Jay Z still rap? - Quora

response.answer_text: Don't really understand you here because he was still featured in meek mill album and he dropped an album with his wife titled EVERYTHING IS LOVE where he did what he still does RAP cos I've never heard that man in a chorus or anything but if you meant is he still good at Rap my answer would be no one in this generation can clean his shoes right now and i mean the Kendricks and Coles of this world. Mic drop (always wanted to do this )
